title.en: Prayer to Invoke the Wisdom Mind of the Gentle Protector Sakya Paṇḍita

text.en: Oṃ svasti!
text.en-trans: om swati

text.en: All the victorious ones throughout the ten directions
text.en-trans: tayé semchen tsok la pen gongpé

text.en: Who intend to benefit innumerable sentient beings,
text.en-trans: rabjam chok chü gyalwa tamché dang

text.en: And especially the foremost bodhisattva Mañjughoṣa,
text.en-trans: khyepar gyalsé tuwo jampé yang

text.en: Manifest as the authentic guru, to whom I pay homage.
text.en-trans: tsenden lamar nang la chaktsal lo

text.en: These days, as most beings are corrupted by the taints
text.en-trans: dengdü nyikmé kyön gyi bakpa yi

text.en: Of the degenerate age and wander far from the genuine path,
text.en-trans: kyewo palcher yangdak lam lé jol

text.en: Fooling themselves, forsaking their own interests for this and future lives—
text.en-trans: rang gi rang lü di chi dön torwa

text.en: Protect me from such a plight, O Gentle Protector, noble guru!
text.en-trans: di lé kyob shik jamgön lama jé

text.en: The elements of the outer world are unstable and fluctuate greatly;
text.en-trans: nö kyi jungwa mi ten peldrib ché

text.en: Beings who inhabit the world know much unhappiness and misery.
text.en-trans: chü kyi semchen midé dukngal mang

text.en: For these realms, which are so affected by various forms of karma,
text.en-trans: natsok lé kyi narwé dro kham la

text.en: Grant some relief, I pray, O Gentle Protector, noble guru!
text.en-trans: ukjin dzö chik jamgön lama jé

text.en: In this land in the past, those possessing the vision of Dharma
text.en-trans: ngönché jong dir chökyi chen denpa

text.en: Were well cared for by great emanated translators and scholars,
text.en-trans: trulpé lo pen chenpo khyé nam kyi

text.en: Such as you, through the two ‘wheels’ of Buddhist teachings,1
text.en-trans: gyalten khorlo nyi kyi lek kyangpé

text.en: And everyone’s happiness, wealth and prosperity increased.
text.en-trans: kyegu tamché dé pal jorpa gyé

text.en: But now beings are deceived by mundane concerns,
text.en-trans: da dü kyewo jikten chö kyi lü

text.en: And those who’ve entered the teachings are lost in undharmic deeds.
text.en-trans: tenpé gor zhuk chö min jawé yeng

text.en: As we lack the protection of the gods of positivity,
text.en-trans: dé la karchok lha yi gön mepé

text.en: We’re worn down, beset by illness, conflict and famine.
text.en-trans: né tsön mugé kyen gyi nampar tak

text.en: Therefore, inspire us, the beings of this time,
text.en-trans: dechir dakchak nga dö drowa nam

text.en: When the five degenerations are so rife, to turn our minds towards the Dharma.
text.en-trans: lona yangdak chö la gyurwa dang

text.en: Prevent the arising of obstacles to Dharma practice,
text.en-trans: damchö drub la barché minjung zhing

text.en: And bless us with the accomplishment of our own and others’ aims.
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: If your pledge to watch over all the beings of former times
text.en-trans: khyö kyi ngöntsé drowa gön mepa

text.en: Who lacked protection was a sincere and stable one,
text.en-trans: kün la zikpé zhalzhé ten lak na

text.en: Why not look upon me too, as I repeatedly recall you
text.en-trans: dungwé shuk kyi ma la bu zhindu

text.en: Like a child desperately missing its mother.
text.en-trans: yangyang dren na dak la chi mi gong

text.en: Even though I turn to you, precious guru, in my mind,
text.en-trans: kyempa nam kyi chab la rewa zhin

text.en: Like someone plagued by thirst and longing for water,
text.en-trans: dak yi jetsün lamé jé chok kyang

text.en: Still I am untouched by your compassion’s radiance.
text.en-trans: gönpo khyö kyi tukjé ö nang gi

text.en: O protector, why have you forsaken me?
text.en-trans: dak la rekpa mepa di chizhik

text.en: From now until I reach the essence of awakening,
text.en-trans: dadung du yang changchub nyingpö bar

text.en: Guru, Dharma lord, as I follow in your footsteps,
text.en-trans: chöjé lama khyö kyi jé zhukpé

text.en: Help me to learn the infinite dharmas to be known
text.en-trans: rabjam shejé chö la wangjor zhing

text.en: And to master twofold bodhicitta, I implore you.
text.en-trans: changchub sem nyi jongwar dzé du sol

text.en: At this time of the degenerate age, let the community of the saṅgha,
text.en-trans: nyikmé dü dir gyalten rinpoche

text.en: Which is capable of preserving the precious teachings of Buddha
text.en-trans: shedrub khorlo nyi kyi dzin zöpé

text.en: Though the two activities of teaching and practice, fill the entire world,
text.en-trans: gendün düpé sateng kün geng shing

text.en: And let everyone devote their entire lives to the Dharma, I pray.
text.en-trans: mitsé chö kyi dawa dzé du sol

text.en: Through the activities of disputation and guidance,
text.en-trans: pakpé yul gyi do ngak zhungluk kün

text.en: Perfectly inspired by an approach of factual reasoning
text.en-trans: ngö tob rikpé lam lé rab drang té

text.en: Based on all the textual traditions of sūtra and mantra in the noble land,
text.en-trans: tsarchö jesu dzinpé trinlé kyi

text.en: May the minds of all beings be turned towards the Dharma.
text.en-trans: kyegü lona chö la gyurwar shok

text.en: May the rule of dharma-protecting kings endure,
text.en-trans: chökyong gyalpö chabsi yündu ten

text.en: The lives of dharma-holders remain secure, and their activities flourish,
text.en-trans: tendzin kyebü kutsé dzetrin gyé

text.en: And, through the positive dawn of a new golden era,
text.en-trans: dzokden dü kyi getsen sarpa yi

text.en: May everyone throughout this temperate land have lasting happiness.
text.en-trans: silden jong kün dewar nepar shok

text.en: May I, during this degenerate age, serve to continue your activity,
text.en-trans: dak kyang nyikmé dü dir gön khyö kyi

text.en: Extending it, O protector, to the farthest reaches in every direction.
text.en-trans: trinlé chok tar pelwé jepor gyur

text.en: May all my connections be meaningful and inspire virtue in others,2
text.en-trans: dreltsé dönden zhennang gé la gyur

text.en: And may my own activity be of service to the Buddha’s teachings.
text.en-trans: sangye ten la jawa jepar shok
